lines.text: My name is Gene Daniels. Call me Mr. Daniels, I like that, don't call me anything else.
Hey, lipshitz.
The name is Horowitz, asshole.
Horowitz asshole?
I heard it was lipshitz.
Yeah, and if your lip shits, what's your asshole doin'?
I'm sorry about your little brother, Moreno.
Oh, you really break my heart, you know that? I'm sorry about your old lady. I'm sorry I didn't get to finish the job.
[to Lofgren]
I lost my brother. All you lost was some skin.
If you think you're hip, you're not. If you were you wouldn't be here.
I killed your little brother, but he's dead because you didn't look after him.
That's Lofgren. They call him Viking. I call him shit for brains.
Shut your fucking mouth, Horowitz.
Two carts for me and two carts for Horowitz... for free.
The only reason you're here is because there is no room for you anywhere else.
Well, why don't you get me a room at the Holiday Inn?
Why don't you wise up?
One way or the other, I'm going to get to the bottom of this.
Hey. What are the odds on me now, Perretti?
Three to two... against you. Nothing personal.
What are you afraid of?
I ain't afraid of anything.
Hey, after what you did to Viking and Tweety, you're IT!

[to Paco]
Do you know what goes on in here? Time stands still. On the outside everyone is getting on with their lives; working, making money, getting laid, all that good shit. Aww, look at your bad self. I was into that gang shit for half of my life. It's dumb, fuckin', nowhere shit!
